DOC.detailed_description: Preimplantation genetic diagnosis ( PGD ) initially develop prevent monogenic disease . However , use extend improve pregnancy rate assist reproductive technique ( ART ) . These new indication call screen aneuploidy ( PGS , preimplantation genetic screening ) . The current indication PGS include advanced maternal age , recurrent miscarriage , repeat implantation failure , severe male factor infertility , previous aneuploid pregnancy , poor embryo quality , chemotherapy radiotherapy elective single embryo transfer avoid multiple pregnancy .
